entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
